original_text: King Hezekiah, this is how you will know that I have spoken a true message from the Lord. This year, you will eat crops that grow by themselves. And next year you will eat what grows from the same seeds. But in the third year you will plant seeds for yourselves, and they will give you a harvest of crops. You will plant vines again and you will eat grapes from them. 19: Isaiah has told Hezekiah about the Lord's message to King Sennacherib. Now he speaks to King Hezekiah himself. King Hezekiah, this is how you will know that I have spoken a true message from the Lord. This year, you will eat crops that grow by themselves. And next year you will eat what grows from the same seeds. But in the third year you will plant seeds for yourselves, and they will give you a harvest of crops. You will plant vines again and you will eat grapes from them. 19: Isaiah has told Hezekiah about the Lord's message to King Sennacherib. Now he speaks to King Hezekiah himself. King Hezekiah, this is how you will know that I have spoken a true message from the Lord. This year, you will eat crops that grow by themselves. And next year you will eat what grows from the same seeds. But in the third year you will plant seeds for yourselves, and they will give you a harvest of crops. You will plant vines again and you will eat grapes from them.
korean_text: 또 네게 보일 징조가 이러하니 너희가 금년에는 스스로 자라난 것을 먹고 내년에는 그것에서 난 것을 먹되 제삼년에는 심고 거두며 포도원을 심고 그 열매를 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: King Hezekiah
this is how you will know
that I have spoken a true message
from the Lord
This year
you will eat crops that grow by themselves
And next year
you will eat what grows from the same seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 씨앗에서 자라는 것을 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: But in the third year
you will plant seeds for yourselves
and they will give you a harvest of crops
You will plant vines again
and you will eat grapes from them
Isaiah has told Hezekiah
about the Lord's message to King Sennacherib
sentences.korean_translation: 산헤립 왕에게 보낸 주님의 메시지에 대해

sentences.original_text: Now he speaks to King Hezekiah himself
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 히스기야 왕 자신에게 말한다
